org.teatrove.trove.net
Interface SocketFace

All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedSocket, CheckedSocket, SocketFaceWrapper, SocketWrapper
public interface SocketFace

An interface to a Socket. Wouldn't it be nice if java.net.Socket was already an interface?

Author:
Brian S O'Neill
